resources.string: Invalid length. An ISBN-13 contains exactly 13 digits.
Invalid character. An ISBN-13 can only contain numbers and hyphens or spaces for separation.
Invalid check digit. Expected check digit %1$d, got %2$d instead.
Invalid length. An ISBN-13 without check digit requires exactly 12 digits.
Empty input. Please enter 12 digits of an ISBN-13.
Empty input. Please enter all 13 digits of an ISBN-13.
